pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Extra Care 6 Miracles Oil Essence 100ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Extra Care 6 MIRACLES OIL ESSENCE is formulated with MACADAMIA OIL & VITAMIN E provides 6 dimensions of hair recovery in 1 for luxuriously beautiful hair.

EXTRA CARE 6 MIRACLES OIL ESSENCE with
MACADAMIA OIL and VITAMIN E offers
6 DIMENSIONS OF HAIR RECOVERY:

1. INTENSIVE CARE and REPAIR
2. HEAT PROTECTION when blow-drying
3. SPLIT ENDS REDUCTION and more RESISTANCE
4. WEIGHTLESS TOUCH and soft feel.
5. CONTROL of frizzy hair and fly-aways
6. LUXURIOUS SHINE and suppleness

Made in Australia
Bottle made from 100% recycled plastic. 100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details

Suitable For: All Hair Types

Size: 100mL

Hair Type: All Hair Types

KEY FEATURES

• 6 Benefits in 1:

1. INTENSIVE CARE and REPAIR
2. HEAT PROTECTION when blow-drying
3. SPLIT ENDS REDUCTION and more RESISTANCE
4. WEIGHTLESS TOUCH and soft feel.
5. CONTROL of frizzy hair and fly-aways
6. LUXURIOUS SHINE and suppleness
• Luxuriously Beautiful Hair
• Bottle made from 100% recycled plastic. 100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details

Warnings

Keep bottle out of direct sunlight and extreme cold.

CAUTION

Keep bottle out of direct sunlight and extreme cold.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Keep bottle out of direct sunlight and extreme cold.

FLAMMABLE WARNING

No

Ingredients

Cyclomethicone, Dimethiconol, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Octocrylene, Parfum, Linalool, Limonene, Benzyl Salicylate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Hexyl Cinnamal, Geraniol, Benzyl Alcohol, Coumarin

Directions

Use sparingly (1-2 pumps) on the midlengths and ends of the hair. USE ON: Dry or towel-dried hair. Leave in.
Keep bottle out of direct sunlight and extreme cold.

SAFETY DIRECTIONS

Keep bottle out of direct sunlight and extreme cold.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Bottle & Folding Box are Kerbside Recyclable. Pump & Cap can be recycled via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for details

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes

Recycling Code: 1 PET(E)
